result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Cody J Pace

records.addlTxt:
2:47 PM Attorney Pablo Galaviz in court for Cody J Pace.  Defendant Cody J Pace in court.  District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin by Julian Marrufo.  

Attorney Galaviz states the defendant was offered a DPA but has a month left of counseling and requests an adjournment for two months.  
The Court will adjourn this matter back before the assigned trial court for a further proceedings date in 60 days.
Hearing scheduled for December 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's Demand for Discovery and Inspection.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt:
09:47 AM Defendant Cody J Pace in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Defense acknowledges receipt of complaint and waives reading of complaint.  
Service admitted/advised of charges and potential penalties.  
Court advises of right to an attorney.  Defendant is not eligible for State Public Defender representation.  
Defendant requests the court appoint counsel.  Court swears defendant.  Court grants request, repayment at the rate of $75.00 per month commencing August 15, 2022.  
THE COURT ORDERS THE DEFENDANT TO GO TO THE BUSINESS CENTER (Rm. 112) RIGHT AFTER COURT TO SET UP A WAGE ASSIGNMENT.
NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 30, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
